description: The AWS::GameLift::Alias resource creates an alias for an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) fleet destination.

Message.description: The message text to be used with a terminal routing strategy. If you specify TERMINAL for the Type property, you must specify this property.

FleetId.description: A unique identifier for a fleet that the alias points to. If you specify SIMPLE for the Type property, you must specify this property.

Type.description: Simple routing strategy. The alias resolves to one specific fleet. Use this type when routing to active fleets.

Description.description: A human-readable description of the alias.

Name.description: A descriptive label that is associated with an alias. Alias names do not need to be unique.

RoutingStrategy.description: A routing configuration that specifies where traffic is directed for this alias, such as to a fleet or to a message.
